decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (952/07 Rev A and 952/08 Rev A, dated 12/02/2014, received 24/03/2014; Planning Design and Access Statement, dated 19th February 2014, received 26/02/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension and outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the external walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 354 jersey Road.
description: Extension of existing garage and erection of new single storey detached outbuilding to rear including gym and music studio for use by occupants of house
